plot: The bloodthirsty bounty hunter Mack Blaster slaughters his way through a nihilistic future world to finally fight his greatest opponent Ringo "Der Schlächter" Mack Man.
title: Mack Blaster - Die Welt im Fadenkreuz
plot_es: The bloodthirsty bounty hunter Mack Blaster slaughters his way through a nihilistic future world to finally fight his greatest opponent Ringo "Der Schlächter" Mack Man.
original_name: Mack Blaster - Die Welt im Fadenkreuz
